text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
This heated two-minute battle will make you forget the coming winter 
cold, because the one you've waited for is back for today's Tenno 
Sho (Autumn)!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The Triple Crown champion, Narita Brian, who was injured right 
before the Tenno Sho (Spring), is ready to race!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's overwhelmingly favored to win, but how exactly will today's 
race turn out?

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: I've been waiting since spring! Bring out the Brian!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: She might break another record today! I can't wait another second!

We didn't get to train as much because of your injury, but you're 
looking good today.

What's most important though is you've got that same will to run. 
Now's your chance to let loose!

What's most important though is you've got that same will to run. 
Now's your chance to let loose!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Right…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll give it all I have.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They've made the final turn into the stretch! Every racer is making a 
dash for the finish!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
What's this?! Has Narita Brian run out of stamina? She's being passed 
by the rear!

Her return to racing that autumn turns out unlike anything we had 
imagined. She places twelfth.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff…

Nice, you're looking good. Your legs aren't having any trouble 
moving.

I was afraid she might not have completely healed yet, but she's 
doing well during training.

Okay, next, let's simulate doing the stretch. The Japan Cup is 
next—that last part of the Tokyo Racecourse is a long one.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: The final sprint… I see.
Is something wrong?
Is something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Mind if we switch to something different? I'll do sprinting on my own 
later.
Sure, fine with me, I guess…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
The Japan Cup is longer than the Tenno Sho (Autumn), so I want to 
work on my pacing.
Got it. Let's do some pace training then.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: All right, I'll get to it.
That's the first time she's ever asked to change the training routine.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I thought I heard she got better…

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Mayano! Training's about to start!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh, okay! Coming right over!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Something's bothering me watching Brian run. It's not as exciting as 
that time at the Hanshin Daishoten.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Brian…

text_block_list.name: TV Host
text_block_list.text:
We asked the fans who were there in person what they thought of 
Narita Brian's run.

text_block_list.name: TV Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Logically, this all makes sense. She'd been recuperating for six whole 
months after all.

text_block_list.name: TV Fan B
text_block_list.text: Exactly! Brian will be back to her old self by the next race!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The TV and newspapers are all saying that her loss was 'cause of the 
injury.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
There's also the fact that it's incredibly difficult to return in peak 
shape after such a long absence. Her instincts had dulled.

After seeing her blow away the competition so many times, it's easy 
to forget something simple.

Winning a race after coming back from an injury is no easy task. We 
just need her to get back to normal before the Japan Cup.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes… You're right.

While I can't say I'm not concerned, her running has always topped 
what I thought she could do.

But… the idea that her absence was the sole reason she lost isn't 
sitting right with me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff… Puff…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sorry, Trainer. But I've made my choice.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I choose to run as I am now.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's the last 200 meters! The mighty Hishi Amazon is in hot pursuit of 
the lead! Narita Brian's struggling in the stretch!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon finishes in a close second! Narita Brian's fallen behind 
and finishes sixth!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Like the Tenno Sho (Autumn), it looks like she just couldn't go the 
distance in the Japan Cup today!
